Title: Startup feedback request: Fractal Press - We publish anthologies of blog posts

Author: bayareaguy
Content:
"Right now" is incompetence, lazyness, lack of awareness, comfort, and politics all rolled into one.

And yet that's what the market generally pays for.

Your list reminds me of Levchin's advice from http://venturebeat.com/2007/03/26/start-up-advice-for-entrep...

As a final word of product development advice, Levchin encouraged founders to think about the Bibleâ€™s seven deadly sins - especially greed, sloth, envy, pride and gluttony. These characteristics, he said, describe many of the primal motivations for users.

Author: papersmith
Content:
(g) Profit!

Hence the gnomes' predicament is solved.
